entities.name: luna
entities.description: The owner of the bedroom and the one who decorated her ceiling with painted faces. She is described as having a great rush of affection for Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A person whose face was painted on Luna's ceiling. He thought that the portraits were breathing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the people whose faces were painted on Luna's ceiling.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another person whose face was painted on Luna's ceiling.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A person whose face was painted on Luna's ceiling.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: The last person whose face was painted on Luna's ceiling.

entities.name: harry (again)
entities.description: Harry is looking at the photograph of a young Luna and her mother.

relationships.description: The golden chains around the pictures are actually the word 'friends' repeated a thousand times, indicating that Luna values friendship.
Harry felt a great rush of affection for Luna when he saw the golden chains.
There is a photograph of a young Luna and her mother in the room.
